subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|林|凡|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=forest}} – lush. Originally a variant form of {{och-l|芃}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: The religious sense “Brahman” is short for {{ltc-l|梵摩|id=2,1}}, {{ltc-l|梵覽摩|id=2,1,1}}, from {{bor|zh|sa|ब्रह्मन्|'''ब्रह्म'''न्|[[Brahman]]}}.
